channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tariffs make sour grapes for American winemakers
item.description: American winemakers tell us why tariffs hurt their industry.

item.title: Texas may ban THC products just a few years after legalization started a big business
item.description: The Texas Legislature is considering a ban on consumable THC products as some lawmakers say the booming business has caused health problems and allowe...

item.title: China's Xi Jinping arrives in Cambodia to wrap up 3-nation Southeast Asia tour
item.description: The visit, Xi's first since 2016, will conclude a three-nation Southeast Asian tour that included stops in Vietnam and Malaysia.

item.title: Trump calls for Fed Chair Jerome Powell's 'termination' in blistering attack

item.title: Trump hopes to jail U.S. citizens abroad. And, retail sales jump ahead of tariffs
item.description: Trump's administration is exploring ways to detain U.S. citizens involved in criminal activity and send them to Salvadoran prisons. And, Trump's tarif...

item.title: Reboot of disaster-hit Fyre Festival postponed, US media reports
item.description: The organisers of the failed 2017 Fyre Festival are reportedly looking for a new location for the reboot.

item.title: U.S. pastor abducted in South Africa rescued in shootout, authorities say

item.title: Tennessee’s GOP leads the fight to deny public education to children without documents

item.title: Ex-Russian general jailed for seven years over bribes
item.description: Lt Gen Vadim Shamarin was sentenced to seven years in a penal colony after being accused of taking bribes.

item.title: Watch: BBC joins retirees aboard China's 'silver trains' that aim to boost economy
item.description: China is encouraging it's retirees to spend their savings on fun initiatives to help boost its economy, as the country's trade war with the US rages o...

item.title: Trump says Fed Chair Powell's "termination cannot come fast enough"
item.description: President Trump lashed out at Fed Chair Jerome Powell over interest rates, saying he should "certainly lower them now."

item.title: French jails have come under attack. Are violent drug gangs to blame?
item.description: A mysterious group has accused Justice Minister Gérard Darmanin of declaring "war" on prisoners.

item.title: US-Somali airstrike as battle rages for key town
item.description: Heavy fighting broke out on Wednesday after al-Shabab raided the town, saying they had captured it.

item.title: How war, money and the quest for discovery entwined the US government and universities
item.description: The showdown between the Trump administration and Harvard University is spotlighting bare-knuckled politics and big dollar figures.

item.title: Maryland Sen. Van Hollen meets with El Salvador’s vice president in push for Abrego Garcia’s release
